{{cpp/experimental/title|make_ostream_joiner}}
{{cpp/experimental/lib extensions 2/ostream joiner/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=experimental/iterator|since=libfund_ts_2|1=
template&lt; class CharT, class Traits, class DelimT &gt;
std::experimental::ostream_joiner&lt;std::decay_t&lt;DelimT&gt;, CharT, Traits&gt;
    make_ostream_joiner( std::basic_ostream&lt;CharT, Traits&gt;&amp; os,
                         DelimT&amp;&amp; delimiter );
}}

创建 {{tt|ostream_joiner}} 对象，从函数实参的类型推导模板实参。

===参数===
{{par begin}}
{{par | os |要将迭代器关联到的 {{tt|basic_ostream}} 对象}}
{{par | delimiter |分隔符}}
{{par end}}

===返回值===
如同用 {{c|std::experimental::ostream_joiner&lt;std::decay_t&lt;DelimT&gt;, charT, traits&gt;(os, std::forward&lt;DelimT&gt;(delimiter))}} 创建的 {{tt|ostream_joiner}} 对象。

===示例===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;experimental/iterator&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;vector&gt;

int main()
{
    std::vector&lt;int&gt; x{1, 2, 3, 4};
    std::copy(x.begin(), x.end(),
              std::experimental::make_ostream_joiner(std::cout, ", "));
}
|output=1, 2, 3, 4
}}
